Activity: Log in to the QA system, check emails, and make adjustments to findings based on colleague feedback.
Prepare for team presentations by creating slides based on the summarized findings.
Contact @Clinical Lead and @EHR Vendor Liaison to review findings and solicit input for the presentation.
Finalize the presentation slides and rehearse presentation delivery.
Conduct final review of work to ensure all findings and solutions are clearly communicated in the presentation.
Present findings to the team, addressing comments and questions as they arise.
Gather feedback from the team members post-presentation and document any additional follow-up tasks.
